column2: also Romanized as Kūhdasht and Kūh-ī-Dasht) is a city in and capital of Kuhdasht County
column8: 994 families.Kuhdasht is a large plain which is surrounded by mountains. In Persian
column11:
which means plain. Kuhdasht was the residence of Kassites, one of the ancient peoples of Zagros Mountains. There are some antique pieces of bronze in Louvre museum from Kassite civilization.
